about_the_game:
Hentai Jigsaw Puzzle Collection: Valentine’s Edition is a Valentine’s Day themed version of Hentai Jigsaw Puzzle Collection

Enjoy the jigsaw puzzles with high quality sexy hentai girls!

Move the puzzle pieces to make the complete image

More then 14 Different Jigsaw Puzzles to Complete

Uncensored Puzzles

Remarkably Cute Graphics

Great Music and Atmosphere

Full Colour and Sketch versions of each picture

Full Colour:


Sketch:


4 different backgrounds for you to chose from


Note: All Characters 18+ Years Old.

Every artwork in our game were paid and/or original from paid commissions. #adult #puzzle
